```{r, include=FALSE}
# Data Wrangling
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)
library(readr)
library(readxl)

# Graphics
library(ggplot2)

# Geographic
library(sf)
library(geobr)
```

# Cattle Prices 

```{r}
prices_cattle <- read_xlsx(
  path = "../Inputs/prices_cattle.xlsx",
  sheet = "Plan 1",
  col_names = c("date","price_brl","price_usd"),
  skip = 4
  )
```
